sentences.en: a monster cat
sentences.cn: 巨型猫

sentences.en: a monster with three heads
sentences.cn: 三头怪兽

sentences.en: a reported sighting of the Loch Ness monster
sentences.cn: 据报道有人看见尼斯湖水怪

sentences.en: Blast them, Jack, what they call the public is a monster.
sentences.cn: 真是的, 杰克, 他们所说的公众是怪物.

sentences.en: Did you see the fish Dad caught? It was a monster!
sentences.cn: 你看到爸爸钓到的鱼了吗？真大！

sentences.en: During the 1980s monster publishing houses started to swallow up smaller companies.
sentences.cn: 20世纪80年代，一些出版巨头开始吞并一些较小的公司。

sentences.en: How long must the iron - hearted monster feed on our life's blood?
sentences.cn: 这铁石心肠的怪物吸着我们的血液,还得吸多久 呢 ?

sentences.en: Many monster high - rise buildings spring up all over the city.
sentences.cn: 许多巨大的 高层建筑 在这座城市拔地而起.

sentences.en: Sarah jokingly called her "my monster"
sentences.cn: 萨拉戏称她为“我的怪兽”。

sentences.en: Studios are rushing out monster movies to take advantage of our new-found enthusiasm for dinosaurs.
sentences.cn: 电影公司趁着刚刚兴起的恐龙热正忙着赶拍怪兽电影。

sentences.en: The film will be a monster hit.
sentences.cn: 这部电影将会非常卖座。

sentences.en: The howling monster with his outcry filled the cavern.
sentences.cn: 山洞里回荡着这个咆哮如雷的巨兽的嗥叫声.

sentences.en: The monster murdered 15 women before the police caught him.
sentences.cn: 这个坏蛋在警察捕获他之前谋杀了15名妇女.

sentences.en: the remains of a prehistoric monster
sentences.cn: 史前怪兽的遗骸

sentences.en: the search for the Loch Ness Monster
sentences.cn: 对内斯湖水怪的搜寻

sentences.en: The song was a monster hit.
sentences.cn: 这首歌大受欢迎。

sentences.en: The Story of the Loch Ness Monster has attracted many tourists to the area.
sentences.cn: 尼斯湖怪兽的传说吸引了很多游客来到这个地区.

sentences.en: There have been many attempts to track down the putative Loch Ness monster.
sentences.cn: 人们为追踪假定存在的尼斯湖水怪做了许多努力。

sentences.en: There have been many attempts, both light-hearted and serious, to locate the Loch Ness Monster.
sentences.cn: 有很多人或随意或认真地尝试过，想要找到尼斯湖水怪。

sentences.en: There’s a monster of a spider in the bath!
sentences.cn: 浴缸里有一只硕大的蜘蛛！

sentences.en: They took to the water intent on netting the £250,000 reward offered for conclusive proof of the monster's existence.
sentences.cn: 他们前往那片水域，打算找到怪物存在的确凿证据，以获得为此设立的25万英镑奖金。

words.tran_cn: 巨大的；怪异的；荒谬的；畸形的
不正常,不正常的人,奇迹,奇物,天才
巨大,庞大,异常大的东西,巨兽

phrases.tran_cn: 尼斯湖水怪（相传在尼斯湖出现的一种巨型怪兽）

trans.tran_cn: 巨大的，庞大的，（建筑物）巍峨的
怪物，恶魔，恶人，庞然大物，畸形，畸胎
trans.tran_en: an imaginary or ancient creature that is large, ugly, and frightening
